ing: 3/4 cup fresh lime juice, or more to taste
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This is a quick and delicious appetizer/dip dish. I promise most guests will enjoy it. You can add TapatioÂ® hot sauce or cayenne for a more spicy taste."
ins: Mix imitation crabmeat, tomatoes, cilantro, serrano chiles, and green onion together in a large bowl. Pour lime juice over the crabmeat mixture and gently mix; season with salt and pepper.
